interactivity.requirements: 10 Kaori Affection You must have seen or permanently missed the following Events: Seen " The Best Ways to Rub a Cock " from Kaori Kadowaki

progression.synopsis: Kaori wants Sensei to use his large, muscley shoulder-tubes to carry some groceries for her. He also buys her some cookie bread. As they talk, the subject comes around to the expression of feelings â€” Sensei doesn't express his very much, but Kaori thinks he should, and worries that he is afraid of happiness. Trying to change the subject, Sensei asks Kaori about her childhood. She says that she only one friend, who disappeared, but she is interrupted by her phone before she can elaborate.

changelog: This Event was added in Update 0.11.
